children.text: var horizSpacing = marginLeft + paddingLeft + paddingRight + marginRight;
return left + (options.chalkFunction ? options.chalkFunction(line) : line) + padding + right;

horizontalBorderLine = repeatString(
    HORIZONTAL_LINE,
    width - marginLeft - marginRight - 2
  )

top =
    spaces(marginLeft) +
    TOP_LEFT +
    horizontalBorderLine +
    TOP_RIGHT +
    spaces(marginRight)

bottom =
    spaces(marginLeft) +
    BOTTOM_LEFT +
    horizontalBorderLine +
    BOTTOM_RIGHT +
    spaces(marginRight)
